Class MusicLibrary

java.lang.Object
MusicLibrary
public class MusicLibrary extends Object
This class creates and store all MusicMedia player into MusicMedia array
Version:
1.0
Author:
Aphane Jimmy

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addMedia(MusicMedia media)
    Add a subtype to the ArrayList, first checking to be sure the parameter is not null
    void
    displayLibrary()
    Will iterate over the ArrayList displaying the entire library using toString()
    void
    playTitle(String songTitle)
    Will validate the parameter appropriately and then search the library for the tile.

  • Method Details

    • addMedia

      public void addMedia(MusicMedia media)
      Add a subtype to the ArrayList, first checking to be sure the parameter is not null
      Parameters:
      media - the media

    • displayLibrary

      public void displayLibrary()
      Will iterate over the ArrayList displaying the entire library using toString()

    • playTitle

      public void playTitle(String songTitle)
      Will validate the parameter appropriately and then search the library for the tile. If found the playSelection() method will be called
      Parameters:
      songTitle - is the song title
